message.name: ERR_PROVIDERSPECIALTY_XRV_SPECIALTY_DELETED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The provider specialty has already been deleted, it cannot be modified.
The provider speciality has already been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERSPECIALTY_XRV_SPECIALTY_ALREADY_DELETED
message.locale: This provider specialty has already been deleted.
This provider speciality has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERSPECIALTY_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_SPECIALTY_READY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: The Specialty, %1c, already exists for this provider from %2d.
The Speciality, %1c, already exists for this provider from %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERSPECIALTY_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_SPECIALTY_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_AND_ENDDATE
message.locale: The Specialty, %1c, already exists for this provider from %2d to %3d.
The Speciality, %1c, already exists for this provider from %2d to %3d.
